p: The response rate of the 74 experts on the procedure was 54% (i.e., 40 replies). Profiles of the experts are shown in Table 3. Experts were classified according to the different categories of criteria as follows: 18 for EP, 16 for PC, 14 for EC, 10 for PH, and 13 for SO. Opinions of 6 cross-category experts who assessed all categories of criteria (multicategory experts) were also included individually in each category.
